name: Nonogram - Picture Cross Games
description:
Have you been tired of the boring black images?
The latest colorful pixelated nonogram game will bring you vivid visual effects and a fantastic game experience.

Reveal hidden images on the board based on the numbers lined up in both directions! To solve the Nonogram puzzles,follow the clues that will help you color the squares to complete the line and choose which of them have to stay empty.

Features:
- Various delicate images
- Free to select difficulty
- Auto-save the progress
- Brief and fresh user's interface
- No wifi needed

Use your left brain to discover the mystery of Nonogram game, which combined numbers and pixel art. Clear your mind, test your logic and enjoy the logic grid puzzles now!
